files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    package="com.example.czg.com1314080901108">
+
+    <application
+        android:allowBackup="true"
+        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
+        android:label="@string/app_name"
+        android:supportsRtl="true"
+        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
+        <activity android:name=".Com1314080901108Activity">
+            <intent-filter>
+                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
+
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+        <activity android:name=".Alarm_clockActivity"
+            android:label="@string/app_name">
+        </activity>
+        <receiver android:name=".CallAlarm" />
+        <activity android:name=".AlarmAlert">
+        </activity>
+    </application>
+
+</manifest>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    tools:context="com.example.czg.com1314080901108.Alarm_clockActivity"
+    android:focusable="false"
+    android:longClickable="false"
+    android:background="@drawable/alarm_clock"
+    >
+    <DigitalClock android:id="@+id/dClock"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textSize="40sp"
+        android:textColor="#0044ff"
+        android:layout_marginTop="84dp"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/textView"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" />
+    <Button android:id="@+id/mSet"
+        android:layout_width="100dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="设置闹钟"
+        android:background="#00000000"
+        android:textSize="25sp"
+        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button2"
+        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/textView" />
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
+        android:text="设置闹钟界面"
+        android:id="@+id/textView"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:textSize="40sp"
+        android:textColor="#00FFFF" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="返回"
+        android:id="@+id/button2"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="47dp"
+        android:textSize="25sp"
+        android:background="#00000000"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+        android:layout_alignEnd="@+id/textView" />
+
+</RelativeLayout>

@@ -14,21 +14,22 @@
     >

         android:layout_width="wrap_content"

-
-    <Button
-        android:layout_width="500px"
-        android:layout_height="100px"
         android:text="设置闹钟"
         android:id="@+id/button"
-        android:layout_below="@+id/timePicker"
+        android:background="#00000000"
+        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
         android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
-        android:layout_marginTop="47dp"
-        android:background="#00000000"/>
+        android:layout_marginBottom="39dp"
+        android:textSize="25sp"/>
+
+    <TimePicker
+        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/timePicker"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" />
 
 </RelativeLayout>
